Posts.Content: I thought I would throw this question out there. I had a lumpectomey about a year ago. I am now starting to have like a puss and blood secretion from the nipple on the surgery side, kinda like when you get a sliver stuck and don't get it out color. Anyone experience this? I go to surgeon friday, kinda want to know what to expect or be prepared for!!!
Posts.Title: Breast secrtions
